Movies.name: Shrek
Movies.stars: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz
Movies.description: After his swamp is filled with magical creatures, Shrek agrees to rescue Princess Fiona for a villainous lord in order to get his land back.

Movies.name: Casablanca
Movies.stars: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid
Movies.description: In Casablanca in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

Movies.name: Underworld: Blood Wars
Movies.stars: Ben Affleck, Elle Fanning, Brendan Gleeson
Movies.description: Vampire death dealer, Selene (Kate Beckinsale) fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her.

Movies.name: Citizen Kane
Movies.stars: Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Dorothy Comingore
Movies.description: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

Movies.name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
Movies.stars: Tom Holland, Michael Keaton, Robert Downey Jr.
Movies.description: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

Movies.name: Captain America: Civil War
Movies.stars: Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr. Scarlett Johansson
Movies.description: Political interference in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between former allies Captain America and Iron Man.

Movies.name: Justice League
Movies.stars: Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot, Jason Momoa
Movies.description: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

Movies.name: The Golden Circle
Movies.stars: Jane Goldman, Matthew Vaughn
Movies.description: When their headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, the Kingsman's journey leads them to the discovery of an allied spy organization in the US. These two elite secret organizations must band together to defeat a common enemy.

Movies.name: The Dark Tower
Movies.stars: Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey, Tom Taylor
Movies.description: The last Gunslinger, Roland Deschain, has been locked in an eternal battle with Walter O'Dim, also known as the Man in Black, determined to prevent him from toppling the Dark Tower, which holds the universe together. With the fate of the worlds at stake, good and evil will collide in the ultimate battle as only Roland can defend the Tower from the Man in Black.

Movies.name: Doctor Strange
Movies.stars: Jon Spaihts, Scott Derrickson
Movies.description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

Movies.name: Deadpool
Movies.stars: Ryan Reynolds, Morena Baccarin, T.J. Miller
Movies.description: A fast-talking mercenary with a morbid sense of humor is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers and a quest for revenge.

Movies.name: Finding Nemo
Movies.stars: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould
Movies.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

Movies.name: The Incredibles
Movies.stars: Craig T. Nelson, Samuel L. Jackson, Holly Hunter
Movies.description: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

Movies.name: Despicable Me
Movies.stars: Steve Carell, Jason Segel, Russell Brand
Movies.description: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

Movies.name: How to Train Your Dragon
Movies.stars: Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, Christopher Mintz-Plasse
Movies.description: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

Movies.name: Chicken Run
Movies.stars: Mel Gibson, Julia Sawalha, Phil Daniels
Movies.description: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

Movies.name: Tangled
Movies.stars: JMandy Moore, Zachary Levi, Donna Murphy
Movies.description: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

Movies.name: Ghostbusters
Movies.stars: Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Wiig, Kate McKinnon
Movies.description: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.

Movies.name: Live by Night
Movies.stars: Ben Affleck, Elle Fanning, Brendan Gleeson
Movies.description: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan.

Movies.name: The Conjuring 2
Movies.stars: Vera Farmiga, Patrick Wilson, Madison Wolfe
Movies.description: Ed and Lorraine Warren travel to North London to help a single mother raising 4 children alone in a house plagued by a supernatural spirit.

Movies.name: Miracle on 34th Street
Movies.stars: Edmund Gwenn, Maureen O'Hara, John Payne
Movies.description: When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.

Movies.name: The Great Escape
Movies.stars: Steve McQueen, James Garner, Richard Attenborough
Movies.description: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

Movies.name: It's a Wonderful Life
Movies.stars: James Stewart, Donna Reed, Lionel Barrymore
Movies.description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Movies.name: Ben-Hur
Movies.stars: Charlton Heston, Jack Hawkins, Stephen Boyd
Movies.description: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

Movies.name: Gone with the Wind
Movies.stars: Clark Gable, Vivien Leigh, Thomas Mitchell
Movies.description: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

Movies.name: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
Movies.stars: James Stewart, Jean Arthur, Claude Rains
Movies.description: A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the United States Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.

Movies.name: 12 Angry Men
Movies.stars: Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam
Movies.description: FA jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

Movies.name: The Ten Commandments
Movies.stars: Charlton Heston, Yul Brynner, Anne Baxter
Movies.description: The Egyptian Prince, Moses, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people.

Movies.name: It Follows
Movies.stars: Maika Monroe, Keir Gilchrist, Olivia Luccardi
Movies.description: A young woman is followed by an unknown supernatural force after a sexual encounter.

Movies.name: Test Free Movie
Movies.stars: anshika, sharvari, rakesh, shreyas, soumya
Movies.description: Test Description

Movies.name: Crimson Peak
Movies.stars: Mia Wasikowska, Jessica Chastain, Tom Hiddleston
Movies.description: In the aftermath of a family tragedy, an aspiring author is torn between love for her childhood friend and the temptation of a mysterious outsider. Trying to escape the ghosts of her past, she is swept away to a house that breathes, bleeds - and remembers.

Movies.name: Tales of Halloween
Movies.stars: Adrienne Barbeau, Hunter Smit, Cameron Easton
Movies.description: Ten stories are woven together by their shared theme of Halloween night in an American suburb, where ghouls, imps, aliens and axe murderers appear for one night only to terrorize unsuspecting residents.

Movies.name: Get Out
Movies.stars: Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford
Movies.description: It's time for a young African American to meet with his white girlfriend's parents for a weekend in their secluded estate in the woods, but before long, the friendly and polite ambience will give way to a nightmare.

Movies.name: Ouija: Origin of Evil
Movies.stars: Elizabeth Reaser, Lulu Wilson, Annalise Basso
Movies.description: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widowed mother and her daughters add a new stunt to bolster their seance scam business, inviting an evil presence into their home.

Movies.name: Starry Eyes
Movies.stars: Alex Essoe, Amanda Fuller, Noah Segan
Movies.description: A hopeful young starlet uncovers the ominous origins of the Hollywood elite and enters into a deadly agreement in exchange for fame and fortune.

Movies.name: The Witch
Movies.stars: Anya Taylor-Joy, Ralph Ineson, Kate Dickie
Movies.description: A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic and possession.

Movies.name: Deathgasm
Movies.stars: Milo Cawthorne, James Blake, Kimberley Crossman
Movies.description: Two teenage boys unwittingly summon an ancient evil entity known as The Blind One by delving into black magic while trying to escape their mundane lives.

Movies.name: Green Room
Movies.stars: Anton Yelchin, Imogen Poots, Alia Shawkat
Movies.description: A punk rock band is forced to fight for survival after witnessing a murder at a neo-Nazi skinhead bar.

Movies.name: Justice League v2
Movies.stars: Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot, Jason Momoa
Movies.description: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

Movies.name: Miracle on 34th Street v1
Movies.stars: Edmund Gwenn, Maureen O'Hara, John Payne
Movies.description: When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.

Movies.name: Kung Fu Panda
Movies.stars: Jack Black, Ian McShane, Angelina Jolie
Movies.description: The Dragon Warrior has to clash against the savage Tai Lung as China's fate hangs in the balance: However, the Dragon Warrior mantle is supposedly mistaken to be bestowed upon an obese panda who is a tyro in martial arts.

Movies.name: Toy Story 3
Movies.stars: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack
Movies.description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

Movies.name: Ice Age
Movies.stars: Denis Leary, John Leguizamo, Ray Romano
Movies.description: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

Movies.name: Daddy's Home 2
Movies.stars: Linda Cardellini, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson
Movies.description: Brad and Dusty must deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

Movies.name: Bad Moms
Movies.stars: Mila Kunis, Kathryn Hahn, Kristen Bell
Movies.description: When three overworked and under-appreciated moms are pushed beyond their limits, they ditch their conventional responsibilities for a jolt of long overdue freedom, fun, and comedic self-indulgence.

Movies.name: Baywatch
Movies.stars: Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario
Movies.description: Devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon butts heads with a brash new recruit, as they uncover a criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay.

Movies.name: What We Do in the Shadows
Movies.stars: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Cori Gonzalez-Macuer
Movies.description: A documentary team films the lives of a group of vampires for a few months. The vampires share a house in Wellington, New Zealand. Turns out vampires have their own domestic problems too.

Movies.name: American Made
Movies.stars: Tom Cruise, Domhnall Gleeson, Sarah Wright
Movies.description: The story of Barry Seal, an American pilot who became a drug-runner for the CIA in the 1980s in a clandestine operation that would be exposed as the Iran-Contra Affair.

Movies.name: Lady Bird
Movies.stars: Saoirse Ronan, Odeya Rush, Kathryn Newton
Movies.description: The adventures of a young woman living in Northern California for a year.

Movies.name: The Addams Family
Movies.stars: Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd
Movies.description: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

Movies.name: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
Movies.stars: Frances McDormand, Woody Harrelson, Sam Rockwell
Movies.description: In this darkly comic drama, a mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder, when they fail to catch the culprit.

Movies.name: Last Flag Flying
Movies.stars: Bryan Cranston, Laurence Fishburne, Steve Carell
Movies.description: Thirty years after they served together in Vietnam, a former Navy Corpsman Larry "Doc" Shepherd re-unites with his old buddies, former Marines Sal Nealon and Reverend Richard Mueller, to bury his son, a young Marine killed in the Iraq War.
